title: Update bug
body: Hp bot is blacked out and i cant see any from other players.

replies.body: This could be some messed up assets with your game files.  See if a repair or a force repatch via the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help out here.  Let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JAnJ9NWH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-07T23:36:01.424+0000)
>
> This could be some messed up assets with your game files.  See if a repair or a force repatch via the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help out here.  Let me know!

it worked
Verify your game options are set to show the HP bars. If so clear the option, apply, then try re-enabling the option again.
